sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef } from "react";
import { FormContainer, InputArea, Input, Label, Button } from "../styles/Forms";

export const Form = ({ onEdit }) => {
  const ref = useRef;
  return(
    <>
      <FormContainer ref={ref}>
      <InputArea>
          <Label>CodCli</Label>
          <Input name="CodCli" />
        </InputArea>
        <InputArea>
          <Label>NomeCli</Label>
          <Input name="NomeCli" />
        </InputArea>
        <InputArea>
          <Label>Endereco</Label>
          <Input name="Endereco" />
        </InputArea>
        <InputArea>
          <Label>Telefone</Label>
          <Input name="Telefone" />
        </InputArea>
        <InputArea>
          <Label>Email</Label>
          <Input name="Email" />
        </InputArea>

        <Button type="submit">SALVAR</Button>

      </FormContainer>
    </>
  )
}
